text: Oswaldo Raul Baca Carbo (June 29, 1931 - May 7, 2014) was an Ecuadorian engineer and politician. He is thought to be a historic leader of the Democratic Party of Ecuador. He was one of the most influential figures in Ecuadorian politics. He was president of the National Congress on three separate occasions, in addition to being president of the Andean Parliament and the Latin American Parliament. Carbo was born in Quito, Ecuador. He died in Quito, Ecuador, aged 82.El Universo. Muere político Raúl Baca Carbo. . ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Presidents of the National Congress of Ecuador Category:Ecuadorian engineers Category:Politicians from Quito
title: Raúl Baca Carbo
